lovegetarian.name: Lacto-ovo vegetarian
lovegetarian.explanation: A follower of a diet that excludes all animal flesh (meat, fish) but allows the consumption of animal-derived foods such as eggs, milk, and dairy products (cheese, yogurt).

ovegetarian.name: Ovo-vegetarian
ovegetarian.explanation: A follower of a diet that excludes all animal flesh (meat, fish) but allows the consumption of eggs.

lvegetarian.name: Lacto-vegetarian
lvegetarian.explanation: A follower of a diet that excludes all animal flesh (meat, fish) but allows the consumption of milk and dairy products (cheese, yogurt).

vegetalien.name: Strictly plant-based
vegetalien.explanation: A follower of a diet that excludes all animal flesh (meat, fish) and animal-derived products (eggs, dairy, and honey).

vegan.name: Vegan
vegan.explanation: A follower of a lifestyle that combines an exclusively plant-based diet (veganism) with the refusal to consume any product (clothing, footwear, cosmetics, etc.) derived from animals or their exploitation (including products tested on animals).

pescetarian.name: Pescetarian
pescetarian.explanation: A follower of a diet that excludes meat but includes the consumption of fish, seafood, eggs, milk, and dairy products (cheese, yogurt).

frugivore.name: Frugivore
frugivore.explanation: A follower of a diet primarily or exclusively composed of fresh fruits, dried fruits, nuts, and seeds.

rawfoodist.name: Raw Foodist
rawfoodist.explanation: A follower of a diet that consists exclusively or primarily of raw, uncooked, and unprocessed foods.

gluten.name: Gluten
gluten.explanation: Cereals containing gluten (wheat, rye, barley, oats, spelt, kamut, or their hybridized strains) and products made from these cereals.

milk.name: Milk
milk.explanation: And products made from milk (including lactose).

nuts.name: Tree nuts
nuts.explanation: Almonds, hazelnuts, walnuts, cashews, pecans, macadamia nuts, Brazil nuts, Queensland nuts, pistachios, and products made from these nuts.

sesame.name: Sesame seeds
sesame.explanation: And products made from sesame seeds.

sulfite.name: Sulfur dioxide and sulfites
sulfite.explanation: In concentrations of more than 10 mg/kg or 10 mg/L.

history.title: The story behind {website} : making every event truly special
history.text_1: It all started with a simple yet frustrating question: why is it so hard to bring loved ones together to celebrate life's important moments ? Whether it's organizing a birthday party, a family reunion, or a themed soirée, juggling RSVPs and logistical details can quickly become a real headache.
history.text_2: Ironically, in a world where everything is connected, event planning remained incredibly disorganized.
history.text_3: {website} was born from a desire : to create a platform that doesn’t just manage events but revolutionizes celebrations to make every event seamless, inclusive, and unforgettable. We envisioned a platform where planning becomes as enjoyable as celebrating.
history.text_4: With {website}, you can engage your guests right from the start. Thanks to an intuitive interface and powerful tools, planning becomes effortless.

quote.text_1: Because every celebration matters, and so do you.
quote.text_2: With {website}, turn every event into unforgettable experiences, allowing everyone to focus on what truly matters: human connections.

values.title: Our values : when technology serves the collective
values.text_1: Absolute simplicity : from invitations to RSVPs, every step is designed to save you time.
values.text_2: Personalization : create events that reflect your style and vision.
values.text_3: Human connection : {website} emphasizes relationships by offering a platform where everyone feels involved.

after.title: What’s next ?
after.text_1: {website} is constantly evolving. We’re introducing new features to make event planning even more dynamic and engaging.
after.text_3: Join us and make every event an unforgettable celebration !

article_1.text_1: This privacy policy applies to the website {website} and aims to inform users of the site about:

article_2.title: Article 2: Principles regarding the collection and processing of personal data
article_2.text_1: In accordance with Article 5 of the European Regulation 2016/679, the collection and processing of data from users of the site adhere to the following principles:
article_2.text_2: Legality, fairness, and transparency: data can only be collected and processed with the consent of the data owner. Whenever personal data is collected, users will be informed that their data is being collected and the reasons for it.
article_2.text_3: Limited purposes: the collection and processing of data are carried out to meet one or more purposes defined in these terms of use.
article_2.text_4: Data minimization: only data necessary for the proper execution of the objectives pursued by the site will be collected.
article_2.text_5: Limited data retention: data is retained for a limited period, of which the user is informed.
article_2.text_6: Data integrity and confidentiality: the data controller commits to ensuring the integrity and confidentiality of the collected data.
article_2.text_7: To be lawful, and in accordance with the requirements of Article 6 of the European Regulation 2016/679, the collection and processing of personal data may only occur if at least one of the following conditions is met:
article_2.text_8: The user has explicitly consented to the processing,
article_2.text_9: The processing is necessary for the execution of a contract,
article_2.text_10: The processing and collection of personal data are necessary for the legitimate and private interests pursued by the data controller or a third party.

subarticle_1.text_1: The user can access, update, modify, or request the deletion of their data directly from their personal space.
subarticle_1.text_2: If applicable, the user has the right to delete their personal space by clicking on 'Delete my account.'

subarticle_2.title: Article 5.2: Right to Data Portability
subarticle_2.text_1: The user has the right to request the portability of their personal data held by the site to another site by contacting the data controller.

subarticle_3.title: Article 5.3: Right to Limit and Object to Data Processing
subarticle_3.text_1: The user has the right to request the limitation or object to the processing of their data by the site, unless the site can demonstrate the existence of legitimate and compelling reasons that override the user's interests, rights, and freedoms.
subarticle_3.text_2: To request the limitation of data processing or to object to the processing of their data, the user must contact the data controller.

subarticle_4.title: Article 5.4: Right not to be Subject to Automated Decisions
subarticle_4.text_1: Under the provisions of Regulation 2016/679, the user has the right not to be subject to a decision based solely on automated processing if the decision has a legal effect concerning them or significantly affects them in a similar way.

subarticle_5.title: Article 5.5: Right to Determine the Fate of Data After Death
subarticle_5.text_1: It is reminded that the user can organize the fate of their collected and processed data in the event of death, in accordance with Law No. 2016-1321 of October 7, 2016.

subarticle_6.title: Article 5.6: Right to File a Complaint with the Relevant Authority
subarticle_6.text_1: If the user believes that their rights regarding personal data have been violated, they can file a complaint with the relevant authority in their country of residence.
